headline: 2 Reasons Why AppLovin Has a Lot to Prove on May 7
summary: AppLovin will report financial results on May 7 and the report could either confirm fears or lay them to rest.  For example, AppLovin (NASDAQ: APP) stock is down more than 40% from highs in 2025, which paints a negative picture.  On May 7, AppLovin is scheduled to report financial results for the first quarter of 2025.
